name: Runway Multiplayer
description:
Ready to challenge your friends? Enter the fast paced and exciting world of Runway Multiplayer on your iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. Manage a variety of Boeing, Airbus, Canadair, and Embraer aircraft at Amsterdam’s Schiphol International Airport. Select open runways for arriving aircraft. Direct them to the gate to unload passengers and then to the flower depot to pick up tulips to export. Then send them on their way to your friend’s device. Be fast though because more planes are arriving. Will you prevail?

Game Center required!

No Internet connection or prefer to play by yourself? Try Runway 2 Free!

Features:
- Drag planes to the runway and draw out paths for them once they are on the ground
- Visual and audio feedback to play quickly and effectively
- Eight types of aircraft each with their own unique characteristics
- Multiple runways, gates, and service depots
- In-game tutorials and booklet makes getting started fun and easy
- Addictive, invigorating gameplay
- Game Center integration for multiplayer and leaderboards
- See whom you are playing against in the status bar
- Auto match to play instantly
